I need an image showing data privacy concepts for a presentation.

tool_call: agentManager_generateImage
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731021600000_m5n6o7p8q", "workspaceId": "ws_1731021600000_r9s0t1u2v", "sessionDescription": "Creating privacy illustration", "sessionMemory": "User preparing data protection training presentation", "toolContext": "Generating data privacy visual", "primaryGoal": "Create privacy concept image", "subgoal": "Generate educational illustration"}, "prompt": "A professional illustration representing data privacy and protection concepts. Central image: a shield icon with a padlock symbol. Surrounding elements: user profile icons connected by encrypted lines (shown as dotted lines with small locks), documents with watermarks, cloud storage with security badges, and GDPR/compliance checkmarks. Use a trustworthy color scheme: deep blue, green, and white. Clean, modern flat design style suitable for business presentation. Conveys security, trust, and regulatory compliance. Horizontal composition.", "provider": "google", "model": "imagen-4", "aspectRatio": "16:9", "numberOfImages": 1, "savePath": "Presentations/data-privacy-concept.png"}
